question:
A local college is having an international day. You want to speak about your country to students from different cultures.

Write a letter to the college head. In your letter:

Tell him/her about the topics that you are going to talk about
Explain why they would be of interest to the students 
Ask about any arrangements that you need to make to give the talk
text: Let me introduce myself, I am Tahsin Adam, I am a fourth-year dental at your college and I am writing this letter regarding the international day event which will be held at the end of this month. Furthermore, I would like to tell my friends some facts about my country through a presentation that I will prepare after your agreement.

Firstly, the most important points I would like others to know about my origin are the history, customs and traditions, and the most famous tourist attractions. For that reason, my project will include some portraits and videos to make the lecture more exciting.
In conclusion, I would like you to give  appropriate facilities. For instance, the overhead projector, amplifiers,
The lecture hall. Moreover, give my colleagues permission to assist me during my speech.
